adrFormatAddress: 154 W 14th St 4th Floor, End of South Wing, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Incredible experience with Zachary and so looking forward to my next session. I left feeling refreshed and relaxed, my shoulders hung free and loose for the rest of the day and my posture naturally improved from the release of built up tension. I was able to totally lose track of time in the course of the session and more importantly I was able to be present in the moment, focusing on my breathing and self. All the anxiety of work and the things I need to do left the room which does not happen easily for me. Really could not recommend Zachary more!

text.text: Incredible experience with Zachary and so looking forward to my next session. originalText.text: My budget only allows for one massage a year so, when I'm looking for a new massage therapist, I try to look for people with great reviews and then I look forward to the massage for sometimes months in advance. Even with all of this anticipation, the massage I got from Zachary exceeded my expectations. It started when I was making the appointment with one of the most thorough intake forms I've ever filled out. It was like he wanted to know everything about my preferences. He was thoughtful in every possible way, from his style of communication to the extra care he takes to make sure you're comfortable before, during and after the massage. His massage technique felt like it was tailored to me (and tailored to my answers on the intake form). Really, the whole experience was exactly what I wanted - it got me into my body and present in a way that I haven't been for a long time. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I've had three sessions so far with ZK Massage, and all of them have been terrific experiences. I found that Zachary really listening to what I was hoping to accomplish, and incorporated it into the session. They're very good at taking things slowly and steadily and listening to what your body needs. I originally went to them for a constant shoulder soreness I was having when turning my head to the side, and after the first session that discomfort was greatly reduced!

originalText.text: This was unlike any massage I have ever had the pleasure of receiving. Zachary is so lovely and really connects with the body. He knows how to read your breath and movements to figure out what is best for your body. I truly was the most relaxed I’ve ever been during a massage. The next day, my body felt great. Usually after massages I am sore the next day, but after Zachary, I felt so rejuvenated and my body felt aligned. I def recommend!

originalText.text:
Yesterday was my 1st experience with Zach.
The combination of his massage, stretching and manipulation of my tense muscles was simply outstanding.
It was an hour and 1/2 of care that my body and mind needed.
I recommend Zach and his technique HIGHLY and look forward to my session with him next month!
